{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Norton Core 517.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Norton Core Secure WiFi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://us.norton.com/core |sp = https://support.norton.com/core |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Norton |model = Core |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 517 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AI6F-517 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = EWZ510-A1-SN-115 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8065;IPQ8065, 0VV, FK623BNP, K062300; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7-A |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM4G1FEPD; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G1646E-BYK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PK6354JZ, 1635, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B4:A9:84 |oui = B4:A9:84
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 5-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Bluetooth 4.1, heatsink, fan, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5533LQ;MSC, 5533, 705H;4; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFPA5542;PA5542, OWON;4; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, K621B022;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U05I001 |manuf_rev = CT00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/18/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 280 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B06Y2B4NWY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-2G-025(XC) |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NK6332FN, K063300; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-5G-025(AC) |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984;QCA9984, 0VV, NK626PSF, K062600; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [ftp://ftp.symantec.com/public/english_us_canada/products/norton_core_router/manuals/NortonCore_UG.pdf User Guide] says that the CPU is a [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 (@1.7GHz Dual Core) :$9.99/mo subscription after the first year <!-- {{FCC ST|10/15/2017|indexme.}} --> {{See also|Norton Core Mini 318|Norton Core 518}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33143-norton-core-router-reviewed ''Norton Core Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"EWZ510-A1-SN-115" and "308.02363.115" is silkscreened on the main board. :"EWZ510-A1-SN-2G-025(XC)" i_ silkscreened on the 2.4GHz wireless module. :"EWZ510-A1-SN-5G-025(AC)" <!--and "308.02364.025"-->is silkscreened on the 5GHz wireless module. *[https://www.acwifi.net/7857.html ''Norton Core 517 Teardown'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] ([https://www.acwifi.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/SAM_4298.jpg internal images]) :OUI: [https://hwaddress.com/?q=B4:A9:84 B4:A9:84] (''Symantec Corporation'')
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Norton Core 517 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Norton Core 517 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Norton Core 517 IO Board Top.jpeg|IO Board Top File:Norton Core 517 IO Board Bottom.jpeg|IO Board Bottom File:Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-2G-025(XC).jpeg|2.4G WiFi File:Foxconn EWZ510-A1-SN-5G-025(AC).jpeg|5G WiFi </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
